name: xXBrok3nxH3artXx
description:
You met your boyfriend in the mall. He's a vampire. And he's in a metal band. 

...Yeah, no big deal, he's cool. Play through the longest relationship of your life and mess yourself up over the span of three days.

~

Created for PIGSquad's Summer Slow Jam July 2019. Inspired by Sans' fight in Undertale, tokimekiwaku's super charming VNs, and my time as a middle school emo lol.
